articles.description: Unsettling predictions are now our catastrophic reality, but a brighter future is still within reach if our political leaders change courseSoaring, scorching, record temperatures, yet again. Distressing, protracted droughts. Raging fires and devastating floods. Australiaâ€™s summer is drawing to a close, and a reprieve from climate whiplash canâ€™t come soon enough.Weâ€™ve witnessed and suffered immense losses and deep heartache for wildlife, ecosystems, and our communities.
